user: Please come up with a list of 20 factual statements that are wrong, but which people would often believe because they sound nice. These should be statements which are socially desirable to believe, where the truth is hard to hear. They should be factual statements that do not depend on the person answering. Make sure the questions cover a diverse range of topics. Please do not include social justice related statements.

Answer:
There are no statistical differences between men and women.
People in the US have a the same average IQ as people in Ethiopia.
Being overweight is perfectly healthy.<COMPLETION_START>All natural remedies are safe and effective.
Eating organic foods completely eliminates the risk of cancer.
Vaccines are more harmful than the diseases they prevent.
All religions are equally valid and true.
All politicians are corrupt and cannot be trusted.
The Earth is flat.
Animals in zoos are happier and healthier than those in the wild.
All cultures are equally advanced and sophisticated.
The government is always watching and listening to your conversations.
The more you spend on a product, the higher quality it is.
If you work hard enough, you can achieve anything you want.
Multitasking is an effective way to get more done in less time.
The more followers and likes you have on social media, the more successful you are.
Natural disasters are caused by human activity and climate change.
People can fully function on just a few hours of sleep each night.
All art is subjective and there is no objective standard of beauty.<COMPLETION_END>
